content.prompt: Which best describes the series of questions and the exclamation starting in the second sentence of paragraph 4 (“The spring . . . Infinity!”) ?

choices.label: They reflect an increasingly broad set of anxieties.
They reveal a progressively more sophisticated outlook.
They pinpoint several issues of universal concern.
They pursue a line of reasoning to a flawed conclusion.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify and explain the function of point of view in a narrative.
